channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report X-2023120447
item.description:
Report X-2023120447

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-15T21:09:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-06
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package found open and wet upon inspection the bottle had been cracked at the bottom while shipping causing and internal leak DescribePack: bottom of bottle had a little crack DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: i placed package in hazmat bag then placed in yellow drum for processing

Report X-2023120445

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was found open and wet upon inspection the lids on the jugs had come loose causing an internal leak there was no packing to protect the product DescribePack: lids on top came loose DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: place package in hazmat bag then placed in yellow drum for processing

item.title: Report X-2023120478
item.description:
Report X-2023120478

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-06
  • City: TEMPE
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handler noticed the package wet in unload. Package was placed in a lined tote, in the hazmat cage under the ventilation hood. DescribePack: The closure was loose, there are no seals under the caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in a lined tote, under ventilation hood in the hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023120247
item.description:
Report X-2023120247

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-01
  • City: TEMPE
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: The shipment was discovered after it was brought back to the station (after 1st delivery attempt). The box was torn/ripped. Inner contents were a white plastic pail of Pool Woow, 3" Chlorine Tablets (110 Tablets). No release. Outer packaging is non specification. The shipment is being held for FAA investigation.

item.title: Report X-2023120231
item.description:
Report X-2023120231

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-15T21:09:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-14
  • City: TUCSON
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Undeclared UN2056 in glass bottle inside 4G outer package. Leakage due to breakage. Multiple Class 3 undeclared boxes/bottles/jerricans hidden in shrink wrapped consignment/pallet. Only one leak discovered. all boxes were not opened. Held onsite for FAA inspection.

item.title: Report X-2023120146
item.description:
Report X-2023120146

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-15T21:09:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-29
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package unloaded from trailer, powder leaking from fiberboard box. Package placed in red tote by QA and processed as damaged. DescribePack: 1/2 inch crack on bottom of drum DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package not moved until contained in red tote.

item.title: Report X-2023120112
item.description:
Report X-2023120112

  • City: GOODYEAR

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was reported damaged and then grabbed by QA. DescribePack: 1 gallon container ruptured and leaked from small hole. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package and contents were placed into hazmat drum with bag and brought to qa area.

item.title: Report X-2023120104
item.description:
Report X-2023120104

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-22
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found torn open with 1 jug missing the lid. Lid was found cracked. Box was torn open and soaked from leakage. Everything was picked up and placed into a hazmat bag then placed into a hazmat red tote and moved to the QA repack station. DescribePack: Box was found torn in half and soaked. The lid has a crack half way around the side going from top to bottom. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Box and contents were paced in hazmat bag and red tote and moved to QA repacking area.

item.title: Report X-2023120057
item.description:
Report X-2023120057

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-22
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package found open and wet upon inspection the jugs had been placed upside down in the box causing and internal leak. the lids where on the bottom of the box opposite of the arrow direction DescribePack: the product was placed in the box upside down. the lids where on the bottom not aligned with the directional arrows on the box DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I placed package in hazmat bag then placed in yellow drum for processing.

item.title: Report X-2023120048
item.description:
Report X-2023120048

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-21
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was on the rollers in the load area when a package rolled backwards and knocked the package to the floor.The package landed on it's top causing the handle to compress and crack. As a result the seam underneath the handle split causing the container to leak. DescribePack: The handle cracked underneath at the seam. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the package was turned upright and placed in a hazmat bag

item.title: Report X-2023111233
item.description:
Report X-2023111233

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-13T18:12:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-20
  • City: TEMPE
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in a trailer during the unload process wet and was placed into a lined HazMat tote. DescribePack: The cap of the inner container was loose causing the container to leak and damage the outer container. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: The package was taken out of the trailer and put into a lined HazMat tote and a manger and/or QA was notified about the damage.

item.title: Report X-2023111258
item.description:
Report X-2023111258

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-21
  • City: CHANDLER
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was brought to the damage area for further investigation. Upon inspection the outer cardboard box looked to be soiled on one corner. Two of the caps loosen during transit which caused about 3-4 ounces of liquid to leak out. DescribePack: Cap locked failed which caused about 4 ounces of liquids to leak out. DurationRel: 48 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed into a hazmat tote for trainer personnel for inspection.

item.title: Report X-2023111173
item.description:
Report X-2023111173

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-17
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I was checking the unload for any packages that needed to receive some tape to go out. I had found this damaged Hazmat in the unload, I had received no call about the Hazmat. I had noticed that it was mostly the box was undamaged. While any of the surrounding packages were undamaged DescribePack: The Plastic Bottles cap came loose and leaked its contents DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Keep the package from being crushed

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The Hazmat went up the belt and was crushed from a ic package DescribePack: the plastic jug was dented and leaked its contents DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: STOP sending HazMat's up the belt

item.title: Report X-2023110853
item.description:
Report X-2023110853

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-07
  • City: CHANDLER
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded and on its way to another trailer when it was tipped over. Once leak was discovered, the package was placed in a lined tote and moved to the designated area for damaged hazardous material packages. DescribePack: Cap to bottle was not tighten close. Small stain left on outside packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Bottle cap closed and package moved to area with proper ventilation.
